content: hello this is a free pattern that i have made for an octopus hat edit thank you for all the love and to squeakyb for combining the pdfs and to everyone who offered you can now download as one pdf i made this a while back so i cannot remember exact yardage i am not tech savvy and i don t check ravelry very often so sorry if i take ages to reply to any questions i spent a long time writing this pattern so others could have a go at something a bit different please appreciate that it s free and that i don t have a lot of time to change things add videos or other thank you
